dict.acceptation: 服务，服侍；服务业；维修服务；服役；
检修，维修；向…提供服务；保养；满足需要；
服务性的；耐用的；服现役的；

sent.orig: The OUT-OF-SERVICE-MANUAL state results from a manual removal of an AP from service.
sent.trans: OUT-OF-SERVICE-MANUAL 状态是由手工使某个 AP 退出服务引起的。

sent.orig: In this paper, We introduce how to build BSS service system with Service-oriented Architecture (SOA).
sent.trans: 在本文中也结合了面向服务的体系结构(Service-oriented Architecture,SOA)来构建电信BSS系统。

sent.orig: Web Service technology is an important technology to implement Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA) and information system integration.
sent.trans: WebService技术是面向服务架构(Service-OrientedArchitecture,SOA)的实现技术之一，也是实现信息系统集成的重要技术。

sent.orig: To accomplish this, your Activity should start a Service in which the upload takes place.
sent.trans: 要做到这一点，Activity应该启动一个Service处理上传工作。

sent.orig: Restoring an AP moves the AP from the OUT-OF-SERVICE (OOS) state to the ACTIVE state.
sent.trans: 恢复 AP 会使 AP 从 OUT-OF-SERVICE (OOS) 状态变为 ACTIVE 状态。
